name: Focus indicated pseudo-class
description: This pseudo-class is called **focus-indicated pseudo-class** and matches every element which matches [`:focus`](https://css4-selectors.com/selector/css2/user-action-pseudo-class/#focus) and the browser decides if the focus should be made evident on the matched element.
example_description: In this example the input will have a blue `border-color` when focused since inputs usually have browser based focus indicators.
